https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7Fnxq6BrAhQgCpMsGYoaqi1KXvk.jpg Bella is a girl that can't seem to fit in - but also doesn't want to. In an attempt to connect with her shadowy past, she discovers the most unusual type of friendship. Bella and the Slasher
